title: Benefits For Anti-Vaxxers? Squid Game Moral Panic 11.1.21
itunes:title: Benefits For Anti-Vaxxers? Squid Game Moral Panic 11.1.21
description:
In episode 1020, Jack and Miles are joined by radio and podcast producer Yael Even Or to discuss Iowa’s capacity for empathy being inspiring, We’re gonna do something about redlining now! Billionaire and amateur architect is designing dorms that look like prisons, Squid Game Moral Panic and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Iowa’s capacity for empathy is inspiring
  2. DOJ: We’re gonna do something about redlining now!
  3. Billionaire and amateur architect is designing prisons...err I mean uhh dorms 
  4. Here Comes the Squid Game Moral Panic 
  5. LISTEN: Vico C - Viernes 13

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
